titleStmt.title: The infallibility of the Holy Scripture asserted, and the pretended infallibility of the Church of Rome refuted in answer to two papers and two treatises of Father Johnson, a Romanist, about the ground thereof / by John Sherman.
titleStmt.author: Sherman, John, d. 1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for Henry Eversden,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
